comment:
As a code reviewer, I agree with the assessment provided by your colleagues. The code for solving the optimization problem is well-structured, follows best practices, and effectively utilizes the PuLP library in Python.

I would recommend conducting thorough testing of the code with various input values to ensure that it produces the expected results and optimizes the total time for the medication to be effective. Additionally, consider adding comments or documentation to explain the purpose of the function and how it solves the optimization problem for better readability and maintainability.

Overall, the code is in good shape, and with proper testing and documentation, it will be a reliable solution for minimizing the total time it takes for the medication to be effective.
